name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Full-Stack Engineer skilled in **Python**, **Django**, and **SQLAlchemy** for backend development, complemented by expertise in **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **OpenAPI**. Proficient in implementing asynchronous job queues with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, enhancing application performance. Adept in frontend technologies including **React** and **TypeScript**, ensuring robust user experiences. Experienced with CI/CD tools like **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, and proficient in cloud platforms such as **Azure**, **GCP**, and **Heroku**. Demonstrated ability to orchestrate containerized applications using **k8s** and manage infrastructure with **Terraform**. Committed to Agile methodology, driving efficiency and collaboration within teams. With a strong focus on delivering scalable and user-centric applications, I bring a track record of success across diverse industries including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, bolstering automation and architectural integrity.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed scalable web applications using **Python** and **Django** to enhance patient management systems, resulting in a 95% accuracy in patient tracking.
• Created and managed APIs using **SQLAlchemy** and **OpenAPI**, improving data accuracy by **40%** and securing sensitive data through robust authentication strategies like **OAuth2**.
• Leveraged **React** with **TypeScript** to improve UI/UX for applications, achieving a **30%** reduction in user task completion time.
• Implemented a notification system using **RabbitMQ** that delivered alerts on time **99%** of the time.
• Established CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, reducing deployment times by **80%** and allowing for seamless integration of new features.
• Utilized **Docker** for containerization of applications, streamlining the deployment process across development and production environments.
• Managed cloud resources using **Terraform** on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)**, maintaining a **99.9%** uptime and efficiently scaling applications with **Redis** caching solutions.
• Employed Agile methodologies to drive project management and improve team collaboration, enhancing overall productivity.

Utilized **Python** and **Django** to develop high-performance backend services, streamlining application efficiency and enhancing user experiences.
Employed **SQLAlchemy** for effective database management, optimizing data retrieval processes and improving query response times by **30%**.
Implemented robust API designs using **OpenAPI**, ensuring seamless communication across services and enhancing code maintainability with a **40%** reduction in bugs.
Leveraged **Celery** and **RabbitMQ** for task queuing and background job management, achieving a **99%** success rate for scheduled tasks.
Developed responsive front-end components using **React** and **TypeScript**, which increased user engagement metrics by **25%**.
Executed continuous integration and delivery pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, achieving automated deployment frequency enhancements of **2X** per week.
Applied containerization strategies using **Docker** and managed Kubernetes deployments with **k8s**, reducing downtime during rollouts by **60%**.
Collaborated in an **Agile** framework to ensure timely project delivery, resulting in a **15%** improvement in team productivity.
Configured cloud infrastructure using **Terraform** and hosted applications on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, effectively reducing infrastructure costs by **20%**.

- Developed backend services using **Python** with **Django** and **SQLAlchemy**, ensuring robust data management and functionality across multiple platforms.
- Designed and documented REST APIs conforming to **OpenAPI** specifications, improving integration efficiency and clarity for team members and external developers.
- Leveraged **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** for optimized database interactions, achieving a **20%** increase in query speed and performance.
- Implemented asynchronous task queues utilizing **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, leading to efficient background processing and a **15%** reduction in response times.
- Constructed dynamic front-end applications using **React** and **TypeScript**, achieving **60%** faster rendering and more maintainable code.
- Developed automated testing suites with **Playwright** for end-to-end testing, resulting in a **25%** decrease in production issues.
- Utilized **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** for continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD), increasing deployment frequency by **35%**.
- Assisted in container orchestration using **k8s**, managing deployments and scaling with **Terraform** for efficient resource utilization.
- Executed deployments across cloud platforms including **Heroku**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, ensuring high availability and performance optimization.
